name: Full Diacritics
text:
Add full diacritics (taškīl) to the Arabic text based on pronunciation and grammar. Maintain the same number of '|' delimiters and leave non-Arabic text, numbers, and symbols unchanged. Example:
Input: وصل |John| إلى مطار |JFK| الساعة (|10:30| صباحا)| يوم الاثنين|.[1]|
Output: وَصَلَ |John| إِلَى مَطَارِ |JFK| السَّاعَةَ (|10:30| صَبَاحًا)| يَوْمَ الِاثْنَيْنِ|.[1]|
